  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Method to initialize field validation listeners for all input fields

    • toexit

      public void toexit​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)

    • testInput

      public void testInput​(int a, int b, int c, double d, double e, int f)
      Testing method to pass inputs to other methods without user input
      Parameters:
      a - NumWeek - Number of Week (accepts 1-15)
      b - CapLabor - Labor Capacity (accepts positive int)
      c - CapGrape - Grape Capacity (accepts positive int)
      d - PrcRose - Unit Price of Rose (accepts positive double, corrected to 2 decimal places)
      e - PrcNoir - Unit Price of Noir (accepts positive double, corrected to 2 decimal places)
      f - FixedCost - Fixed Cost of the entire production (accept positive int)

    • testCalculation

      public double[] testCalculation()
      Testing method to return output from linear programming method in Solver.java
      Returns:
      an array of outputs: [OptRose, OptNoir, OptTotal, GrossProfit, ProfitMargin]

    • testWarningState

      public boolean[] testWarningState()
      Testing method to return warning states
      Returns:
      array of booleans: [w1, w2] corresponding to warning states 1 and 2

    • calculation

      public void calculation()
      Method to call solver and store outputs in array Opt_result

    • formattedOutput

      public java.lang.String[] formattedOutput()
      Method to convert output values to strings
      Returns:
      array of String: [OptRose, OptNoir, OptTotal, GrossProfit, ProfitMargin]

    • warningText

      public javafx.collections.ObservableList<java.lang.String> warningText()
      Adds warning messages according to warning states [w1, w2]
      Returns:
      Observable List of warning message Strings

    • toclick

      public void toclick​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Method when "Run" button is clicked in the UI. retrieves values from inputs, calls calculation method, stores output values in output fields, and show corresponding warnings.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - When user clicks the "Run" button
